mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dev_game ( id, developer_profile_id, name, description, release_date, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{developerProfileId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{releaseDate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, developer_profile_id, name, description, release_date, created_at, updated_at FROM dev_game WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, developer_profile_id, name, description, release_date, created_at, updated_at FROM dev_game WHERE developer_profile_id = #{developerProfileId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE dev_game SET developer_profile_id = #{developerProfileId}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
